title: SPOILER TALK! Star Wars Andor Episode 5 - Kinda Funny Screencast
description:
Learn more about the NZXT FHD Canvas Gaming Monitors at  https://nzxt.co/KFGFHD

Start your credit journey with Chime at at http://chime.com/kfgames

Tim, Barrett, and Carboni give their reaction and review of Star Wars Andor on Disney Plus starring Diego Luna.
 
Follow Anthony: https://twitter.com/acarboni
